roles: Personal Envoy on Cyprus to UN Secretary-General António Guterres
supporting_quotes: María Ángela Holguín Cuéllar (born 13 November 1963) is a Colombian politician and diplomat who has been serving as United Nations Secretary-General António Guterres' Personal Envoy on Cyprus since 2024.

organizations: Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Colombia
roles: Minister of Foreign Affairs of Colombia
supporting_quotes: Minister of Foreign Affairs In office 7 August 2010 – 7 August 2018
Holguín served as the Minister of Foreign Affairs of Colombia from 2010 to 2018.

organizations: Permanent Mission of Colombia to the United Nations
roles: Permanent Representative of Colombia to the United Nations
supporting_quotes: Permanent Representative of Colombia to the United Nations In office 16 September 2004 – 11 September 2006
She has also served as the 25th Permanent Representative of Colombia to the United Nations
Colombian Ambassador to Venezuela In office 16 September 2002 – 20 August 2004
and as Ambassador of Colombia to Venezuela.
